sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INSR3000 (DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM FROM PSNL0110 AA WHERE AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = ( SELECT MAX (BB.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) FROM PSNL0110 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND EMYMT_TYP_CD = 'A0420010') AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM INSR3000 NN WHERE NN.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND NN.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND NN.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM )

INSERT INTO INSR3000 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD , HLTH_INSR_AQTN_DT , HLTH_INSR_LSS_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #emymtSeilNum# , #socInsrDducEthdCd# , #hlthInsrAqtnDt# , #hlthInsrLssDt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR3000 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD=#socInsrDducEthdCd# , HLTH_INSR_AQTN_DT=#hlthInsrAqtnDt# , HLTH_INSR_LSS_DT=#hlthInsrLssDt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INSR3000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD , HLTH_INSR_AQTN_DT , HLTH_INSR_LSS_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR3000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , SOC_INSR_DDUC_ETHD_CD , HLTH_INSR_AQTN_DT , HLTH_INSR_LSS_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR3000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR3000 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR3000 WHERE
DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
